Chordate:


Chordate spun around in chair, the chair taking Skulletron's shots, but 
Chordate could feel the beams stab into the armor in his back.  Pressing a 
few commands, he soon had Skulletron on enemy.

He pressed a few more buttons, lifting his hands up, a metal shield two feet 
thick soon covered all control panels in the bridge, protecting the vital 
equipment.  Chordate took out his weapon, jumping out of his chair, landing 
on his chest as three autoguns extended from the cieling, opening fire on 
Skulletron.
